featured.text: To persuade the boy to return home, Bill and Sam had to tell him that his father was taking him bear-hunting.
Sam: See if a name inside the bag.
Bill and Sam were soon desperate and decided to 18 the little terror.

definition.zh_def: 一個常見的男性名字，通常用作Samuel的簡稱。
definition.en_def: A common male given name, often a diminutive of Samuel.
definition.example: Sam is my best friend and we hang out every weekend.
